description: Find the most variable features (genes) in scRNA-seq data
name: scRNAseq Feature Selection

properties.name: selection.method
properties.description: How to choose top variable features. See Seurat documentation.

properties.name: nfeatures
properties.description: Number of features to select as top variable features.

properties.name: loess.span
properties.description: Loess span parameter used when fitting the variance-mean relationship.
